predicate.note: Frames file for 'swallow' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: cause to go down the throat

example.name: complicated tracing
example.text: ``Sit tight'' through the coming volatility, Mr. Reitman suggests, though he concedes that many small investors will find Jaguar's zigzags ``too hard *trace-1* *trace-2* to swallow *trace-3*.''

example.name: poor John
example.text: John swallowed his pride and his chewing gum.
example.arg: his pride and his chewing gum
